Title: Koi... Mil Gaya
Writer: Rakesh Roshan (story), Rakesh Roshan (screenplay), Honey Irani (screenplay), Sachin Bhowmick (screenplay), Robin Bhatt (screenplay), Javed Siddiqui (dialogue)
Actors: Rekha, Hrithik Roshan, Preity Zinta, Rakesh Roshan
Plot: A developmentally disabled young man tries to continue the work his father did in communicating with extra-terrestrials from outer space, which leads to something miraculous and wonderful.
